newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-ANZ says to cut credit card rates.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-ANZ says to cut credit card rates.

text.p: Australia and New Zealand Banking Group Ltd (ANZ) said on Tuesday it would drop interest rates on its full range of credit card products.

The bank's largest rate reduction was a 200 basis point cut on its ANZ Visa Standby card to 15.95 percent, ANZ said in a statement. ANZ's lowest rate after the cuts, which are effective December 1, will be on its Low Interest Mastercard, which will charge 13.75 percent after a cut of 20 basis points.
